All games started fine on WinXP Pro SP3 x86, Intel Core i7-2600K, 4GB DDR3 Apacer, P67A-GD65 (B3) (MS-7681), 2GB AMD HD 6950 DVI..
No SN or crack needed.

But I only played the first game a bit, until I realized, that this game badly wants to be Doom 3 alike - bad flashlight, tries to scare the player, repetitive levels, constant confusion about where to go and what to do. And also, it has repetitive enemies like Half-Life 2 has.
But unlike F.E.A.R., Doom 3 actually does a good job at scaring the shit out of players.

No wonder, why nobody "shares" F.E.A.R., it's just not worth it and is absolutely overrated.

F.E.A.R. has been disqualified.
